column1: Smoque BBQ////Love Love Love this place!  I went back several times
column2: and haven't been disappointed.  I do wish they served beer
column3: but I have only been at lunch anyhow.  Maybe they let you BYOB?  Shortly after I went there for lunch
column4: I saw the restaurant featured on Diners
column6: and Dives!  That was super exciting to see!!
